meanings.sent1: The colorful picture book had many pictured animals.
meanings.sent2: The artist created a beautiful pictured landscape.
meanings.sent3: She pictured a world where everything was made of candy.
meanings.sent4: His mind pictured a symphony of colors dancing in the sky.
meanings.sent5: The pictured scene was so vivid, it felt like you could step into it.

meanings.sent1: The children had pictured adventures in their minds.
meanings.sent2: She had a pictured image of her dream house.
meanings.sent3: He pictured himself as a superhero saving the day.
meanings.sent4: Her future success was pictured in her mind like a bright light.
meanings.sent5: The pictured castle in the story seemed so real to the kids.

meanings.definition: Depicted in a photograph or painting
meanings.sent1: The pictured family portrait hung proudly on the wall.
meanings.sent2: The artist's masterpiece was a beautifully pictured sunset.
meanings.sent3: The cat somehow got pictured in the background of the photo.
meanings.sent4: The emotions of the characters were perfectly pictured in the painting.
meanings.sent5: The pictured moment captured in the photograph brought back memories of joy.
